import React from 'react' import{Card, CardBody} from 'reactstrap'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import './tour-card.css' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id, title, city, photo, price, featured, reviews} = tour3 const totalRating = reviews?.reduce((acc,item)=> acc + item.rating, 0); const avgRating = totalRating=== 0 ? ' ' : totalRating === 1 ? totalRating : totalRating / reviews?.length; return (
{ featured && Featured}
{city} {avgRating} {" "} ({reviews.length})
{title}
â‚¹{price} /person
) } export default TourCard
